Sentencas: To optimize the reliability of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs), an analysis method based on automatic spectral clustering and neighborhood rough sets is proposed in this article.
Titulo: Multistate Reliability Analysis of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using Automatic Spectral Clustering and Neighborhood Rough Sets

Sentencas: This is the first application of multistate reliability theory to SOFC systems.
Titulo: Multistate Reliability Analysis of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using Automatic Spectral Clustering and Neighborhood Rough Sets

Sentencas: First, a state partitioning method based on automatic spectral clustering is proposed to partition the operational data into different classes.
Titulo: Multistate Reliability Analysis of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using Automatic Spectral Clustering and Neighborhood Rough Sets

Sentencas: Then, the feature extraction method based on the neighborhood rough set is used to find the most sensitive variables to system state changes.
Titulo: Multistate Reliability Analysis of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using Automatic Spectral Clustering and Neighborhood Rough Sets

Sentencas: Finally, the accuracy of state segmentation and feature extraction is verified by training state classifiers.
Titulo: Multistate Reliability Analysis of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using Automatic Spectral Clustering and Neighborhood Rough Sets

Sentencas: In addition, the generality of the method is verified by migrating it to another pure hydrogen-fueled SOFC system.
Titulo: Multistate Reliability Analysis of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using Automatic Spectral Clustering and Neighborhood Rough Sets

Sentencas: The results show that the state segmentation method successfully partitions the electrical characteristics into ten states.
Titulo: Multistate Reliability Analysis of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using Automatic Spectral Clustering and Neighborhood Rough Sets

Sentencas: Even the data in the early stage of failure can be well segmented.
Titulo: Multistate Reliability Analysis of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using Automatic Spectral Clustering and Neighborhood Rough Sets

Sentencas: Moreover, the feature extraction method extracts six variables that are most sensitive to state changes, which reduces the number of variables by 85.7%.
Titulo: Multistate Reliability Analysis of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using Automatic Spectral Clustering and Neighborhood Rough Sets

Sentencas: The state classifier can achieve over 94% correct state recognition rate within 30 s.
Titulo: Multistate Reliability Analysis of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using Automatic Spectral Clustering and Neighborhood Rough Sets

Sentencas: Meanwhile, the method has good generality and transferability.
Titulo: Multistate Reliability Analysis of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells Using Automatic Spectral Clustering and Neighborhood Rough Sets
